Articles.Content:
Hi! My name is Jan (or Jannibal of course)

I'm 21 y/o and a technical physics student at the Hague University of applied sciences.

I've been playing the demo for a few weeks and decided to buy the game about a week ago. Since then I've managed to get a space station in orbit, several astronauts on minmus and a small base on the mun. I even managed to (crash) land a small satellite on Eve! So I believe i've got the basics covered. Currently I'm trying to turn that space station in to a refueling station for manned flights towards other planets, though I haven't figured out yet how to transfer fuel from one ship (station) to another
To transfer fuel, right click on one tank, then hold alt while right clicking on another tank. Buttons will appear on each tank for "in" and "out."
